enrl_requirement: Enrollment Requirements: Reserved for Sophomores, Juniors, and Seniors from every undergraduate school only.
title: SoC COMM_ST 367-0-20 Nonprofit Communication Management

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: This course focuses on the management of nonprofit organizations. Topics include (a) the dynamics of the social sector, (b) identifying stakeholders, (c) governing and leading nonprofit organizations, (d) communication strategies for enhancing capacity, (e) organizational assessment, and (f) obtaining and managing resources. Students will self select into teams working on specific identified projects for nonprofit clients.

subject: COMM_ST
